did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Record of William Henry Corbusier, Colonel, U.S. Army Retired 1924
did.abstract: Typescript of biographical account and reminiscences about events at posts while serving as surgeon, 1872-1875, and 1884-1888. Includes information about the health conditions of Native Americans and soldiers at the Verde River Indian Agency, San Carlos Apache Indian Agency, and Camp Verde in Arizona.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Record of William Henry Corbusier, Colonel, U.S. Army Retired (AZ 116). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: U.S. Army surgeon; in Arizona Territory, 1872-1875, and 1884-1888.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized in narrative sequence.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Typescript of biographical account and reminiscences about events at posts while serving as surgeon. Includes information about the health conditions of Native Americans and soldiers at the Verde River Indian Agency, San Carlos Apache Indian Agency, and Camp Verde in Arizona.

item.subject: Indians of North America -- Medical care -- Arizona -- History
